title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
oscars_won_details: Honorary Award (To Walt Disney for a significant screen innovation)
description: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

title: The Life of Emile Zola
description: The biopic of the famous French muckraking writer and his involvement in fighting the injustice of the Dreyfus Affair.

title: The Awful Truth
description: A married couple suspicious of each other's fidelity files for divorce and begins sabotaging each other's new romantic interests.

title: La Grande Illusion
description: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German POW camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.

title: A Star Is Born
oscars_won_details: Honorary Award (W. Howard Greene for color photography)
description: A young woman comes to Hollywood with dreams of stardom, achieving them only with the help of an alcoholic leading man whose days are numbered.

title: Lost Horizon
description: A plane crash delivers a group of people to the secluded land of Shangri-La, where life is peaceful and people do not age.

title: Captains Courageous
description: A spoiled brat falls overboard from a steamship and gets picked up by a Portuguese fisherman on a fishing boat, where he is forced to earn his keep.

title: Stage Door
description: A boardinghouse for aspiring actresses houses a mix of women with different backgrounds and ambitions, leading to friendship and tragedy.

title: Make Way for Tomorrow
description: An elderly couple is forced to separate when they lose their house and none of their five children will take both of them in.

title: Dead End
description: The lives of a gang of street urchins, a gangster returning to his old neighborhood, and an architect intersect in a New York City slum.

title: In Old Chicago
description: A fictionalized account of the Great Chicago Fire of 1871 and the O'Leary family who occupied the center of the drama.

title: Nothing Sacred
description: A big-city reporter attempts to resurrect his career by exploiting the story of a small-town woman supposedly dying of radium poisoning.

title: Stella Dallas
description: A working-class mother makes the ultimate sacrifice to ensure her daughter has the social standing and happiness she never could.

title: The Prisoner of Zenda
description: An Englishman on holiday in a fictional European kingdom is persuaded to impersonate the King to save the throne from the King's wicked brother.

title: Easy Living
description: A wealthy banker, angry with his wife, throws her fur coat out the window where it lands on a poor working girl, causing everyone to assume she is his mistress.

title: A Day at the Races
description: A veterinarian posing as a doctor, a racehorse owner, and his friends struggle to help a sanitarium owner keep her business open with the help of a misfit horse.

title: Shall We Dance
description: A ballet dancer and a tap dancer fake a marriage for publicity, but eventually fall in love for real.

title: Way Out West
description: Stan and Ollie attempt to deliver a deed to a gold mine to the daughter of a deceased prospector but are duped by her evil guardian.

title: The Good Earth
description: A Chinese farmer and his former slave wife face locusts, famine, and revolution as they struggle to maintain their land and family.

title: Topper
description: A fun-loving couple, now ghosts after a car accident, decide to shake up the stuffy lifestyle of their favorite banker friend.

title: Heidi
description: A young orphan girl is sent to live with her reclusive grandfather in the mountains, only to be taken away again to live with a wealthy invalid.

title: The Prince and the Pauper
description: Two identical young boys, a beggar and a prince, swap places by accident and have to survive in each other's worlds.

title: Pépé le Moko
description: A French gangster hiding in the Casbah of Algiers risks capture when he falls in love with a beautiful tourist.

title: One Hundred Men and a Girl
description: The daughter of an unemployed musician forms an orchestra of similarly unemployed men and tries to get a famous conductor to lead them.

title: Young and Innocent
description: A man unjustly accused of murder goes on the run with the help of a police constable's daughter to find the real killer.

title: Wee Willie Winkie
description: A young girl and her widowed mother live at a British Army outpost in India during the colonial era, where she charms the regiment.

title: Kid Galahad
description: A boxing promoter takes a young bellhop under his wing and turns him into a prize fighter, angering a rival gangster.

title: San Quentin
description: An ex-Army officer takes over as chief guard at San Quentin prison and tries to implement fair reforms, but inmates plan a breakout.

title: Marked Woman
description: A nightclub hostess decides to testify against her gangster boss after he beats her and kills her younger sister.

title: The Hurricane
description: A Polynesian sailor is unjustly imprisoned by a colonial governor; meanwhile, a massive typhoon threatens to destroy the island.

title: Black Legion
description: An auto factory worker turns to a violent, Ku Klux Klan-like hate group when he loses a promotion to a foreign-born co-worker.

title: History Is Made at Night
description: A woman tries to divorce her possessive shipping magnate husband and falls in love with a dashing headwaiter, leading to a dramatic confrontation on an ocean liner.

title: Angel
description: The neglected wife of a British diplomat has a brief fling with a stranger in Paris, only to find him later as a guest in her own home.

title: True Confession
description: A pathological liar confesses to a murder she didn't commit to boost her lawyer husband's career, but the plan spirals out of control.

title: Tovarich
description: Russian royals exiled in Paris after the revolution run out of money and are forced to take jobs as servants in a banker's household.

title: It's Love I'm After
description: A quarrelsome stage couple agrees to help a young fan break off her engagement by having the actor pretend to be an unbearable boor.

title: Elephant Boy
description: Based on a Kipling story, a native boy in India claims he knows the secret gathering place of the elephant herds.

title: Think Fast, Mr. Moto
description: Japanese detective Mr. Moto solves a diamond smuggling ring while travelling on a ship from San Francisco to Shanghai.

title: Vogues of 1938
description: A wealthy socialite jilts her fiance to work as a model for a successful couturier, causing complications in his business and personal life.

title: Maytime
description: An elderly woman recounts her life as an opera singer in Paris and her tragic romance with a baritone singer.

title: Night Must Fall
description: A charming but psychopathic bellboy worms his way into the household of a wealthy invalid, while the invalid's niece suspects him of a local murder.

title: The Firefly
description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a beautiful Spanish singer secretly works as a spy against the French.
